title: 3D Modeling Competency Enhancement Program Using the 6E Instructional Model

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment centered on Rhino software, with a mixed composition of IT and non-IT majors

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply metacognitive strategies during 3D modeling tasks through the 6E model.
Learners can integrate theoretical knowledge and practical skills to solve complex design problems.
Learners can complete 3D modeling project outcomes through self-directed learning in mobile environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
